results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 04e477c8f6224c148f33732c3bc09c70. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 0f78835cec5e4442a56b371e4645c4d2:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.
